metadata.name: Uncommon Userinit Child Process
metadata.comment: Detects uncommon "userinit.exe" child processes, which could be a sign of uncommon shells or login scripts used for persistence.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\userinit.exe')) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\explorer.exe')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('netlogon.bat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('usrlogon.cmd')) OR lower(process.cmd_line) = lower('powershell.exe') OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\proquota.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\proquota.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files (x86)\\citrix\\hdx\\bin\\cmstart.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files (x86)\\citrix\\hdx\\bin\\icast.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files (x86)\\citrix\\system32\\icast.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files\\citrix\\hdx\\bin\\cmstart.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files\\citrix\\hdx\\bin\\icast.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files\\citrix\\system32\\icast.exe')) OR process.name is null))

output.summary: Detects uncommon "userinit.exe" child processes, which could be a sign of uncommon shells or login scripts used for persistence.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate logon scripts or custom shells may trigger false positives. Apply additional filters accordingly. References: https://cocomelonc.github.io/persistence/2022/12/09/malware-pers-20.html, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/server-core/server-core-sconfig#powershell-is-the-default-shell-on-server-core
